title: G510 How do I lock and unlock the screen?
answer:
If the screen is on, press the Power button to lock the screen. If idle for a specified period, the
phone automatically locks the screen.
To unlock the screen, press the Power button to light up the screen and drag down.

 

Your phone also supports facial recognition technology. To enable the face unlock function,
touch Settings > All > Security > Screen lock > Face Unlock.
